# Decision Log Template

Use ADR format. Create entries in `docs/projects/<project>/management/decision-log.md`.

## ADR-XXX: [Title]

- **Date:** YYYY-MM-DD
- **Status:** Proposed | Accepted | Deprecated | Superseded
- **Deciders:** [Team]
- **Context:** [Problem]
- **Decision:** [Choice]
- **Alternatives:** [Options]
- **Consequences:** [Positive/Negative/Risks]
